snippet: The area that was among the hardest hit by the BP spill that state wildlife officials announced the emergency closing of some coastal waters to commercial fishing.
abstract: Wildlife officials announce the emergency closing of some coastal waters to commercial fishing after Hurricane Isaac churns up a large amount of oil in a part of south Louisiana that was among the hardest hit by the BP oil spill.
lead_paragraph: The area that was among the hardest hit by the BP spill that state wildlife officials announced the emergency closing of some coastal waters to commercial fishing.

headline.seo: Louisiana: Hurricane Isaac Churns Up Oil Off Coast
headline.main: Louisiana: Storm Churns Up Oil Off Coast
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Storm Churns Up Oil Off Coast
